metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/CTY_Main_A- Talk to Civilian Civilian - S_LOW_CountingHouse_Civilian_04 7d487dda-ca17-4251-8958-a96c4ee5e2f7 - (-105; 10; -232)

0.speaker: Gilla Merrun
0.text: If you're one of Barek's friends sent to talk me down, tell him I've made up my mind! I'm buying that stake in the circus and running away!

1.speaker: Gilla Merrun
1.text: You don't understand. Barek doesn't understand. The way Ringmaster Lucretious looked at me...
